metadata.title: CVE-2023-3159 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
A use after free issue was discovered in driver/firewire inoutbound_phy_packet_callback in the Linux Kernel. In this flaw a localattacker with special privilege may cause a use after free problem whenqueue_event() fails.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3159` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-41-generic - 5.15.0-41.44
linux-image-5.15.0-41-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-41.44
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-41-generic - 5.15.0-41.44
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-41-generic-64k - 5.15.0-41.44
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-28-generic - 5.19.0-28.29~22.04.1
